name: Printing for Fabrication Online
content: Printing for Fabrication 2020 is a dynamic, interactive, online conference with live Q&A and discussions to engage with an international network of imaging professionals. Experts from around the world will present recent progress in mature and leading-edge imaging technologies. Courses, keynotes, and sessions will explore a broad range of applications, including 3D, packaging, industrial, and textile printing as well as printed electronics, and life sciences. The Short Course Program will occur during the week of 12 October 2020 with the full technical program occurring from 19-22 October 2020\. Registration will open last summer 2020.
organizers: The Society for Imaging Science and Technology (IS&T)
